review.reviewBody: Always delicious, never a mistake so far!
ordered a 14" Large Pepperoni Lover's with extra cheese and received a what looked like nothing extra although I paid an extra 8 dollars. Definitely wouldn't pay the upcharge again.
Flatbread was horrible: overcooked, like cardboard, missing toppings, too. Utterly tasteless. Went from best to worst rating.
There were no vegetables present in the Regular Mediterranean Vegetable pasta.Such a disappointment and  a waste of money.
The pizza was fine but cold
